{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Wistron NeWeb |model = DAUK-W8812 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 6, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Wistron_NeWeb_DAUK-W8812 |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = 6-pin header (non-standard connector) |formfactor = module |vendor_id = 0bda |device_id = 881a |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NKRDAUK-W8812 |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = BC:30:7D, CC:95:D7 |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AU; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam = |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/05/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This module would seem to be used in some ''VIZIO'' devices, perhaps the following... *M55-C2 *P552ui-B2 [[Wistron NeWeb]] P/N: 054.03037.0001 The USB from a Vizio pulled DAUK-W8812 is indeed 0bda:881a (w/ BC:30:7D OUI). ===Header pinout=== 
1 (WIFI_RESET)
2 (5V)
3 (Data +)
4 (Data -)
5 (GND)
6 (WIFI_WAKE)
